response.overview: A child's memories are crossed by biotechnologies that reshape his body and its history:  A transvestite rite of applying hormones that manifests its deviant character in three segments: image, body and gender. The gushing syringe inaugurates a failure in the matrix of gender and the molecular constitution of the body, in which bones, skin and muscles are pulverized into cyberspace and merge with the molecules of images in a movement of cybernetic dissolution.
response.title: Trivakra
